Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Emotions Revealed, Future History, Amateur Astronomers and 3-D Microscopes
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how our facial muscles involuntarily reveal emotions like sadness and anger. And, what does our use of bottled water say about us? And, some of the world's most passionate astronomers don't even need to leave their own backyards. And cutting-edge microscopes are helping to create new medical breakthroughs.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Chasing Beetles, Finding Darwin and Ladybug Mystery
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When Charles Darwin published "On the Origin of Species," he transformed the biological sciences forever. 150 years later, Darwin's ideas remain as central to scientific exploration as ever. Entomologist David Kavanaugh, who discovered a new species of beetle in 1980, predicted that a second new beetle species would be found in the same area. Find out if his prediction came true.

Clip.Title: SKIN DEEP
Clip.EpisodeSummary: New research reveals the crucial role our skin color plays in our species' survival and reproduction, while dispelling narrow-minded notions that have plagued us throughout history.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

And, some of the world's most passionate astronomers don't even need to leave their own backyards. And cutting-edge microscopes are helping to create new medical breakthroughs.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Chasing Beetles, Finding Darwin and Ladybug Mystery
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When Charles Darwin published "On the Origin of Species," he transformed the biological sciences forever. 150 years later, Darwin's ideas remain as central to scientific exploration as ever. Clip.EpisodeSummary: New research reveals the crucial role our skin color plays in our species' survival and reproduction, while dispelling narrow-minded notions that have plagued us throughout history.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A whole region to discover with landscapes telling of ancient stories between the blue sea and the fascinating inland, from its caves carved in rock, to the small fishing villages, to tastes, traditions and local folklore.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A journey along Nova Scotia's Bay of Fundy coastline is a cultural and geological marvel - from historic Acadian Villages, to world-famous stone formations - rising from the sea.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Her husband lies wounded, unable to walk, so Laura Secord sets out on a long journey to warn the British of a possible American attack.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As technology advances, discover why we must respect Mother Nature as the ultimate power on this planet.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Chasing Beetles, Finding Darwin and Ladybug Mystery
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When Charles Darwin published "On the Origin of Species," he transformed the biological sciences forever. 150 years later, Darwin's ideas remain as central to scientific exploration as ever. Entomologist David Kavanaugh, who discovered a new species of beetle in 1980, predicted that a second new beetle species would be found in the same area. Find out if his prediction came true.

Clip.Title: SKIN DEEP
Clip.EpisodeSummary: New research reveals the crucial role our skin color plays in our species' survival and reproduction, while dispelling narrow-minded notions that have plagued us throughout history.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet performs revolutionary surgical techniques to save the lives of his four legged patients. See Oscar the cat get a bionic foot transplant and Mayo the arthritic dog, an "X-Men" inspired surgical procedure.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: About the size of Texas, the island country of Papua New Guinea sits just to the North of Australia. At Papua's far eastern tip lies Milne Bay - holding one of the planet's highest concentrations of marine species.

Clip.Title: THE PREDATOR COAST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On southern coast of Africa all must bow to the power of the coastal plain's seasons: a ruthless cycle that has the power to give life and take it away.

Clip.Title: BLOOD RIVER CROSSING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A baby zebra and his mother join hundreds of thousands of wildebeest and other herbivores on a bloody mission through the predator-packed expanses of the Serengeti-Mara ecosystem. Their mission is survival, but when the mother and son become separated in the crocodile-infested Mara River, each must fight its own battle alone.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Burlesque artist Dita von Teese drops by to find the perfect frock for a red-carpet event, while a costume designer from "Glee" shops for the cast's wardrobe. It's just another day at the office inside L.A.'s finest vintage store, The Way We Wore(r).

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: 40 UNDER 40
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes of the "40 under 40: Craft Futures" exhibition, featuring traditional and non-traditional works of decorative art created by the top 40 American craft artists under the age of 40.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
